name: event-card-compact
title: Event Card Compact
oneLiner: A compact vertical event card with header on top and content below

apiDoc.name: EventCardCompact
apiDoc.description: A compact, vertical event card designed for space-efficient layouts. Header on top shows avatar, author name, and timestamp. Content below with 3-line clamp. Features a subtle muted background with hover effects. Automatically registered with the content renderer for kinds 1 and 1111 with priority 5. Perfect for displaying events in grids or compact feeds.
